io.cdap.http

Class AbstractHttpResponder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cdap.http.AbstractHttpResponder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpResponder

    public abstract class AbstractHttpResponder
extends Object
implements HttpResponder
    Base implementation of HttpResponder to simplify child implementations.

            String jsonString)
        Description copied from interface: HttpResponder

      • sendChunkStart

        public io.cdap.http.ChunkResponder sendChunkStart(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpResponseStatus status)
        Description copied from interface: HttpResponder
        Respond to the client saying the response will be in chunks. The response body can be sent in chunks using the ChunkResponder returned.
        Specified by:
        sendChunkStart in interface HttpResponder
        Parameters:
        status - the status code to respond with
        Returns:
        chunk responder for sending the response
